welcome_message_title: Welcome to Jerez de la Frontera
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jerez de la Frontera, where the charm of Andalusia awaits you. Known for its sherry wine, flamenco, and beautiful architecture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. ¡Bienvenidos!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jerez De La Frontera Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.
